description: History of all corporate transactions of business entities with the Secretary of State. The dataset goes back to the 1800’s and contains millions of records. The Colorado office of the Secretary of State houses five divisions: Business, Licensing, Elections, Administration and Information Technology, and the Business Division files documents for certain business organizations and business names and other associated data

metadata.attribution: SOS - Colorado Secretary of State business division
